#Problem 3

input milk

1. 33
2. 31
3. 67
4. 29
5. 17
6. 38
7. 44
8. 25
9. 32
10. 52
11. 60
12. 35
13. 68
14. 21
15. 34

nomilk <- c(39, 47, 40, 15, 60, 71, 46, 42, 63, 20, 45, 66)

input nomilk
1. 39
2. 47
3. 40
4. 15
5. 60
6. 71
7. 46
8. 42
9. 63
10. 20
11. 45
12. 66
13. 68

stem milk
stem nomilk

univar milk
univar nomilk
median(nomilk)
